ValidationRule.description: Checks if Proposal Status Summary is not blank before moving the stage to Submitted
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName ="Research_Partnership", ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName) ,"Project Scoping"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Submitted"), ISBLANK(Proposal_Status_Summary__c) )
